This new arrival helps him rehearse for a talent show and leads both boys to learn from each other and grow closer.","popularity":12.261,"poster_path":"/7ae4SOYdZo1aXsfUwwhho1bSRE9.jpg","release_date":"2023-10-05","title":"Bonus Track","video":false,"vote_average":5.8,"vote_count":5},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[18],"id":226003,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Random","overview":"Interspersed with a commentary by a female narrator,who at times assumes their roles,the father,mother and daughter and son of a black,South London family commence their day and we follow them through it in all its mundanity until it climaxes in a random act of violence,killing one of the family and taking up the after-math.","popularity":4.25,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"2011-08-23","title":"Random","video":false,"vote_average":3.5,"vote_count":2},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[18],"id":388583,"original_language":"fi","original_title":"Da Capo","overview":"Interwoven with scenes that are meant to grab attention by their stunning composition, this biographical look at Finland's violinist Arto Arsi is not so much a narration of his childhood and early years, as an attempt to artistically show what was happening inside his psyche during that time. Literally sold to a master teacher, Sergei Rippas (Tarmo Manni) by his mother when he was still a child, the violin prodigy was forcefully and strictly raised to practice, practice, and perfect his technique. Once an adult, Arsi finds a way to escape the rigors of a U.S. tour and drowns his overworked self in drink, or seeks out one-night stands, or otherwise lets off steam. The tightly-wound spring that has been coiled since he was forced into his grueling training and work sessions -- shown through symbolic images -- eventually snaps in a healthy way, freeing Arsi at last to continue on, simply for the love of music.","popularity":2.47,"poster_path":"/qOpmTjHV74StdTmtybSzfobeL6w.jpg","release_date":"1985-08-16","title":"Da Capo","video":false,"vote_average":2.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[18,27],"id":388593,"original_language":"es","original_title":"Olalla","overview":"Based in the story by Robert Louis Stevenson, \"Olalla\" tells the story of a gothic and decadent family of genetic vampires who need human blood to survive, and where incest is the only way to maintain the family line.","popularity":2.988,"poster_path":"/4oRmV79cTHFYJPLyAkQE287i4iK.jpg","release_date":"2015-01-29","title":"Olalla","video":false,"vote_average":5.9,"vote_count":8},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[18],"id":226058,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Motherland","overview":"After a long absence abroad, young Asian American woman Raffi Tang is called home when her estranged mother is murdered. Overwhelmed by the slowness of the health care system and the scarcity of resources, she decides to search for an extreme solution in her work environment: the world of street children.","popularity":1.788,"poster_path":"/7wSL7VVj2p8jxhE2lVR66Op08iT.jpg","release_date":"2013-10-20","title":"Through the Eyes","video":false,"vote_average":5.0,"vote_count":3},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[18,10749],"id":225760,"original_language":"nl","original_title":"Lulu","overview":"Leon Mortier, a wealthy publisher, whilst driving through the forest one day, stops when he sees Lulu walking down the long narrow road. She gets into the car. Leon is amused and intrigued by her. When he pulls off, suddenly out of nowhere a man appears in front of the car and Leon accidentally hits him. He decides to take them both home to recover. Leon falls madly in love with Lulu. Both Lulu and the man stay on with him in the house. Lulu's behavior is unpredictable. Leon becomes suspicious and paranoid about her. As he begins to suspect that his friends are being unfaithful with Lulu, he decides to throw a dinner party with some of his closest friends. During the dinner he wants to confront them with their infidelity and expel them all from his life with Lulu.
